creator: jasper88@mail.ru
text:
Created attachment 34092
Full log build

Hello, when i try build apache 2.4.23, with command "rpmbuild -tb ./httpd-2.4.23.tar.bz2" i get message: "error: File not found: /root/rpmbuild/BUILDROOT/httpd-2.4.23-1.x86_64/usr/lib64/httpd/modules/mod_proxy_fdpass.so"

While past build "apache 2.4.20" going ok, i don't have any errors.

Please excuse my bad English, I hope you understand my problem and can be of any help

Full log build in attachment file

CentOS Linux release 7.2.1511 (Core), 3.10.0-327.18.2.el7.x86_64

Apparently the same issue has been discussed on mailing list.
Here is the last response posted:

+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=

This has been fixed at the build level (not only rpm, see [1]) and
will be available in the next 2.4 release.

Regards,
Yann.

[1] http://svn.apache.org/r1755078
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
